content: unholey granny square designed by melinda miller http //mocrochet blogspot com/ for those who want a solid granny square without all the holes skill level beginner materials worsted weight yarn crochet hook size h / 5 0 mm tapestry needle pattern notes increases for each consecutive round is indicated in paranthesis work rounds 3-10 exactly the same except insert the increase in stitches as indicated and work them accordingly to make a 12 square i used 9 rounds of double_crochet and one of single_crochet measure your square frequently to see what stitch you will need to use on round 10 to achieve a 12 square when changing colors draw the next color through the last two loops of the stitch complete stitch commence pattern chain 4 round 1 2 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook chain 2 *3 double_crochet in same chain chain 2 repeat from * twice more join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain 4 pull tail to close hole round 2 chain 3 1 double_crochet in each of next 2 double_crochet *in chain-2 space work 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet work 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 double_crochet repeat from * twice more in chain-2 space work 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 rnds 3 - 10 chain 3 1 double_crochet in each of next 4 6 8 10 12 14 16 18 double_crochet *in corner work 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet work 1 double_crochet in each of next 7 11 15 19 23 27 31 35 double_crochet repeat from * twice more in corner work 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet work 1 double_crochet in each of next 2 4 6 8 10 12 14 16 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 note if using the single_crochet for round 10 work 3 single_crochet in each corner space after round 10 finish off weave in ends block sample color changes round 1 black round 2 rust round 3 rust round 4 black round 5 teal round 6 teal round 7 black round 8 yellow round 9 yellow round 10 black copyright -
